RelatedSentence: Defense Minister Kim Kwan - jin will hold talks with his Mongolian counterpart Dashdemberel Bat-Erdene on Tuesday to discuss security issues on the Korean Peninsula .
Defense Minister Kim Kwan - jin will hold talks with his Mongolian counterpart Dashdemberel Bat-Erdene on Tuesday to discuss security issues on the Korean Peninsula .

The Defense Ministry said Monday that in the talks , the two ministers will exchange views on security conditions in Northeast Asia , and discuss ways to enhance military exchanges and cooperation between the two nations .
